articles.description: The owners of outdoor retail chain Macpac will return $1.7 million in JobKeeper payments as pressure builds on other profitable companies to do the same.
articles.content: The owners of outdoor retail chain Macpac Australia will return $1.7 million in JobKeeper payments to the federal government, as pressure builds on profitable companies to pay back taxpayer handouts.… [+4331 chars]
